img_above_text:
# Pungent Flesh Chunk
The Pungent Flesh Chunk is one of the Key Items you can find in Yellow Wind Ridge during Chapter 2. It is unmissable as it is dropped from the mandatory boss: King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair.

img_summary: The image depicts an inventory screen from a game, showcasing the "Pungent Flesh Chunk," a legendary key item. The item description states it is flesh torn from a foe, emitting a pungent odor that may attract "yaoguais" (likely creatures or entities in the game). The context suggests it is obtained during Chapter 2 in Yellow Wind Ridge after defeating the mandatory boss, King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince. The item appears to play a narrative or gameplay role tied to progression or interaction with specific game elements.
